titleStmt.title: Dictionary, Natural Sciences & Medecine, by Ariel, part 1 of 2

repository.orgName: Bibliothèque nationale de France. Département des Manuscrits

summary.p: A dictionary of natural sciences and medecine by Édouard Ariel. 1st part of 2 parts. Part 2 = BnF Indien 141.
The Arabic pagination of BnF Indien 140 is continued in BnF Indien 141. Compare also 1 à 50 (BnF Indien 140, U1a, f[1]r) and 101 à 150 (BnF Indien 141, U1a, f[1]r).
Not mentioned by James (2000), while BnF Indien 141, its continuation, is.

extent.note: The leaves are broader in their middle than at their edges.

collation.desc: the front cover. Verso marbled. Shelfmark on spine and recto.
1 folio = front guard leaf. No foliation. Blank recto verso. Recto marbled.
1 folio = Title Page. No foliation 1. f1v blank. Paper with threads. 220 x 175 mm.
198 folios = Dictionary proper. Arabic pagination 1-392. This pagination is continued in BnF Indien 141. 220 x 175 mm (various formats in facts; some folios folded).
1 folio = Title Page. No foliation 1. f1v blank. Paper with threads. 220 x 175 mm.
1 folio = back guard leaf. No foliation. Blank recto verso. Verso marbled.

additions.desc: BnF shelfmark sticker: INDIEN 140 (front cover, verso).
BnF shelfmark in black pencil: Tamoul N° 140 (f[1]r).

binding.p: Marbled paper covers. Shelfmark on the spine.

acquisition.p: Received, August 1st, 1866, from the Société Asiatique. See BnF, département des Manuscrits, inventaire 7 = Dons: manuscrits et imprimés documentaires, 1848-1895, no. 1192.

provenance.p: Written by Édouard Ariel (1818-1854). Bequested by Édouard Ariel to Société Asiatique (Rosny 1868, p. 177).

listBibl.bibl: Cabaton, Antoine (1912). Catalogue sommaire des manuscrits indiens, indo-chinois et malayo-polynésiens. Bibliothèque nationale. Département des manuscrits. Paris: E. Leroux. — See p. 26.
Vinson, Julien & Feer, Léon & s.n. (1866-). Catalogue des manuscrits tamoul et télinga. Manuscript, BnF Indien 577. — See f. 38r, no. 140.
Vinson, Julien (1867). Catalogue des manuscrits tamouls. Corrected proofreadings printed by the atelier oriental de l’Imprimerie nationale. BnF “4-IMPROR-77 (B)” — See p. 38, no. 140.
Vinson, Julien (n.d.). BnF Indien 1062, f54r, no. 139 140.
James, Gregory (2000). Colporuḷ: A History of Tamil Dictionaries. 1st edition. Chennai: Cre-A.

encodingDesc.p: Transliteration conventions ― Unmarked puḷḷi, ō, and ē restored. Uppercase for initial vowels (in excerpts only). ― Abbreviations ― c = column, f = folio, lf = library foliation = lm = left margin, r = recto, rm = right margin, U = unit (codicological and/or textual), v = verso.

body.seg:
1 à 50
Dictionnaire
Répertoire
Dictionnaire
des sciences naturelles
& médicales
d’après les notions qu’en possèdent les Hindous répandues dans
l’Inde
& les principalement d’après
les traites en langue tamile.
